pages.text: The Arcane Rune is a revolutionary altar component that bridges Ars Nouveau's Source magic with Blood Magic's altar system. Unlike traditional runes that provide static bonuses, the Arcane Rune's power fluctuates based on its internal Source supply.

Crafted using $(item)Blank Rune$() at the center, any $(item)Stone$() in corners, $(item)Blank Slate$() top and bottom, and $(item)Source Gems$() on the sides. This combines Blood Magic and Ars Nouveau components into a hybrid rune.

$(animus)Source-Powered Rune$()$(br2)Place this rune in your Blood Altar structure just like any other rune. It stores up to 1000 Source internally and can receive Source via Ars Nouveau's dominion wand linking system.

pages.title: Linking Source
pages.text: To supply the Arcane Rune with Source:$(br2)1. Hold a $(item)Dominion Wand$()$(br)2. Sneak + Right-click a $(item)Source Jar$() or $(item)Relay$() to select it$(br)3. Right-click the $(item)Arcane Rune$() to link them$(br)4. Source will automatically flow to the rune$(br2)The rune holds up to 1000 Source. You must link it - it cannot pull Source on its own!

pages.title: Power States
pages.text: The Arcane Rune has two distinct states based on Source availability:$(br2)$(blood)Powered State$() (20 Source consumed every 10 seconds):$(li)Acts as a Speed Rune but 20%% faster$(li)Provides Dislocation Rune bonus$(br2)$(will)Unpowered State$() (No Source available):$(li)Acts as a Speed Rune at 67.5%% effectiveness$(li)No Dislocation bonus

pages.title: Strategic Use
pages.text: The Arcane Rune excels in hybrid builds:$(br2)$(li)Provides superior altar speed when Source is plentiful$(li)Acts as a backup speed rune when Source runs out$(li)The dislocation bonus increases LP transfer rate$(br2)Consider the Source consumption rate (20 per 10 seconds = 2 Source/second per rune) when planning your Source generation and storage capacity. This can be configured in the config file.

pages.title: Requirements
pages.text: To use the Arcane Rune:$(li)$(animus)Ars Nouveau must be installed$()$(li)Use a Dominion Wand to link Source Jars$(li)Ensure linked jars are kept filled$(br2)The rune emits a subtle glow (light level 7) when placed, making it easy to identify in your altar structure.
